item.title: The Sims 4: Ghost Historian Aspiration Guide
item.description:
Quick Links

  • Ghost Historian Milestones
  • Completion Reward

The Ghost Historian aspiration from The Sims 4: Life & Death focuses on Sims with a fascination for the afterlife and a drive to uncover its mysteries. Found under the Knowledge category, this aspiration encourages Sims to interact with ghosts, explore haunted locations, and refine their Writing and Thanatology skills—an academic pursuit centered on death and the supernatural. Aspiring Sims will need to engage in conversations with ghostly figures, collect their stories and recording them for future generations.

This aspiration suits those who enjoy digging into the paranormal aspects of the game while working to gain insight into the mysteries surrounding the lives and deaths of Sims. Each requirement for this aspiration brings Sims closer to becoming skilled ghost communicators and record-keepers, all while earning aspiration points and unlocking special interactions that deepen their bond with the supernatural world. Completing this aspiration also rewards Sims with a unique trait, giving them an edge when interacting with ghosts and adding a memorable new layer to their gameplay experience in The Sims 4 . Here's how to complete this relatively straightforward aspiration.

Ghost Historian Milestones

While the Life & Death expansion offers a wide range of new features, including Tarot reading, funeral events, two new careers, and more, the Ghost Historian aspiration primarily focuses on the Thanatology mini-skill, ghost interactions, and book writing. To complete this aspiration, players will need to guide their Sims through several tasks involving research, skill-building, and connecting with the afterlife. Writing books on supernatural topics, researching Thanatology, and establishing relationships with ghosts are central to progressing in this aspiration, setting up Sims to gain deeper insights into both the living and the departed.

Here are the requirements for completing the Ghost Historian aspiration:

  1. Getting in the Spirit
    • Befriend a Ghost
    • Achieve Level 2 Thanatology Skill
    • Achieve Level 2 Writing Skill

  2. Writer Among Wraiths
    • ​​​​​​​​​​​​​​ Befriend Another Ghost
    • Find a Rare Item in a Crypt
    • Achieve Level 3 Thanatology Skill
    • Achieve Level 4 Writing Skill

  3. Phantasmal Fantasy
    • Find a Rare Item in a Crypt
    • Make Contact with Edith
    • Achieve Level 7 Writing Skill

  4. Spectrally Spectacular
    • Write a Horror Book
    • Earn Royalties from Publishing Books

The initial milestones for the Ghost Historian aspiration are relatively straightforward, as they center on befriending ghosts and building both the Thanatology and Writing skills. Ghosts are commonly found in Ravenwood, especially within the Mourningvale neighborhood, where Sims have plenty of opportunities to connect with these spirits. Players can raise Thanatology and Writing through computer activities or by purchasing skill books, making these milestones achievable from the comfort of home. Traits that help with skill gain like Genius or for social interactions like Friendly can be quite helpful for these goals. Alternatively, Sims in the Grim Reaper or Undertaker careers will naturally gain Thanatology skill, adding a helpful bonus for those pursuing this unique aspiration.

To complete the final milestone of the Ghost Historian aspiration as quickly as possible, players should prioritize writing and publishing books to earn royalties instead of merely practicing writing or reading skill books. Once a Sim reaches level 7 in the Writing skill, the option to write Horror Books will become available. Players will need to write 3 Horror books, and earn minimum of 2000 Simelons from royalties.

How To Find a Rare Item in a Crypt?

Crypts can be found throughout Ravenwood's various neighborhoods, offering an enticing exploration opportunity for adventurous Sims. However, for those who prefer a more straightforward approach, players can easily purchase “The Crypt of Eternity” from Build mode. Once acquired, players can simply click on the crypt to explore the underground passages, initiating a rabbit hole interaction that involves navigating a series of choices.

These choices may vary and can be affected by the Sim's inventory or skill set, adding a layer of strategy to the exploration. Depending on the selected options, Sims may return with rare items, contributing to the aspiration goal. To fully achieve the goals associated with this aspiration, Sims will need to explore the crypt multiple times as they need to return with 2 rare items at least, ensuring they uncover all the secrets hidden within its ancient walls.

How to Make Contact with Edith?

​​​​​​​

Making contact with Edith is one of the more mysterious goals in the Ghost Historian aspiration, as it involves unraveling a mystery rather than completing straightforward tasks. To begin this quest, players should look for her mother, Alice, who can be found roaming various neighborhoods in Ravenwood. Notable locations include the Guardian Tree in Mourningvale and the Well of Longing and Regret at Crow's Crossing.

The quickest way to summon Alice is through the Guardian Tree. Once players locate her, they can initiate the interaction by selecting "Ask About Alice's Sorrow." This will trigger a mini-quest that guides players toward contacting her children: Deimos, Freddy, Ann, and ultimately Edith. Each NPC can be found using the clues provided, making the quest relatively easy to navigate. While players don’t need to complete the entire quest to achieve their goal, establishing the first contact with Edith is sufficient to fulfill this particular aspiration requirement.

Completion Reward

Upon completing the Ghost Historian aspiration, Sims will earn the Reward Trait, Ghost Whisperer. This trait significantly enhances a Sim's ability to build relationships with ghosts, making interactions smoother and more engaging. Sims with this trait will experience excitement when encountering all types of ghosts, specters, crows, and even the Grim Reaper, adding a delightful twist to their interactions with the supernatural.

Completing milestones are also quite useful for completing Soul's Journey steps, as well as to gain Satisfaction Points.

item.title: Roblox: Devas of Creation Codes (November 2024)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Devas of Creation Codes
  • How to Codes for Redeem Devas of Creation
  • How to Get More Devas of Creation Codes

Devas of Creation is arguably one of the most well-developed RPGs on Roblox . In addition to the exciting combat system, the game has a large world with various dungeons, secrets, and other activities. As is often the case with this style of game, though, you'll have to look for many different items to progress.

Fortunately, some of these items can be obtained in just a few clicks by using Devas of Creation codes. Each code can be redeemed for useful rewards like Escape Scrolls, Essence Tokens, and Reaction Tokens. With this in mind, fans of this popular Roblox game definitely won't want to miss out on them.

Updated November 1, 2024, by Artur Novichenko: Although the previous codes expired, we have some good news - we just got a new one. Go to the list below and get your freebie before it expires. We update this article frequently, so check back later.

All Devas of Creation Codes

Working Devas of Creation Codes

  • DOCHalloween - Redeem this code for rewards. (NEW)

Expired Devas of Creation Codes

  • DOCFortuneCode - Redeem this code for rewards.
  • DOCDungeonCode - Redeem this code for rewards.
  • DOC115KLikes - Redeem the code to get 3 Blessed Armor Enchant Scrolls, 2 Resurrect Scrolls, 3 Trait Spins, 1 Warehouse Slot and 1 Inventory Slot.
  • WeekendEventBoostRewards - Redeem this code for rewards.
  • DOC110KLikes - Redeem this code for 2x Blessed Armor Enchant Scrolls, 2x Blessed Weapon Enchant Scrolls, and more
  • DOC105KLikes - Redeem the code to get rewards
  • DOCSpecialRewards - Redeem the code to get rewards
  • DOC100KLikes - Redeem the code to get rewards
  • DOC95KLikess - Redeem the code to get 1 Resurrect Scroll, 1 Blessed Escape Scroll, 2 Powerful Healing Potion, 1 Essential Blazing Shrimp Plate, and 2 Essential Shielding Elixir
  • DOC85KLikess - Redeem the code to get rewards.
  • DevasDiscord175K - Redeem the code to get 2 Resurrect Scrolls, 2 Blessed Escape Scroll, 2 Powerful Healing Potions, and 2 Essential Shielding Elixir
  • DOC75KLikes - Redeem the code to get 1 Resurrect Scroll, 1 Blessed Escape Scroll, 2 Powerful Healing Potion, 2 Essential Blazing Shrimp Plant and 2 Essential Shielding Elixir
  • DOC70KLikes - Redeem the code to get 1 Resurrect Scroll, 1 Blessed Escape Scroll, 2 Powerful Healing Potion, 2 Powerful Mana Potion and 2 Essential Shielding Elixir
  • DOC65KLikes - Redeem the code to get 1 Resurrect Scroll, 1 Blessed Escape Scroll, 2 Powerful Healing Potion, 2 Powerful Mana Potion, and 1 Essential Searing Fish Pie
  • DOC55KLikes - Redeem the code to get 1 Resurrect Scroll, 1 Blessed Escape Scroll, 2 Powerful Healing Potion, 2 Powerful Mana Potion, and 1 Essential Searing Fish Pie
  • DOC45KLikes - Redeem the code to get 1 Resurrect Scroll, 1 Weapon Enchant Scroll, 1 Blessed Escape Scroll, 1 Powerful Mana Potion, and 1 Essential Fortune Nut Mix.
  • DOC40KLikes - Redeem the code to get 1 Resurrect Scroll, 1 Weapon Enchant Scroll, 1 Mining Mastery Flask, 1 Blessed Escape Scroll, and 1 Lumbering Mastery Flask.
  • DOC35KLikess - Redeem the code to get 1 Resurrect Scroll, 1 Weapon Enchant Scroll, 1 Armor Enchant Scroll, 1 Mining Mastery Flask, and 1 Cooking Mastery Flask.
  • DOC30KLikess - Redeem the code to get 3500 Essence Tokens, 1 Resurrect Scroll, 1 Weapon Enchant Scroll, 1 Mining Mastery Flask, and 1 Crafting Mastery Flask.
  • DOC100K - Redeem code to get Essential Enchanted Nectar, 3500 Essence Tokens, Resurrect Scroll, and 100 Faction Tokens.
  • DevasReleaseCode - Redeem code to get Essential Swift Meat Omelette, 2000 Essence Tokens, Crafting Mastery Flask, and 2 Escape Scrolls.
  • DOC20KLikes - Redeem code to get a Crafting Mastery Flask, 3500 Essence Tokens, Weapon Enchant Scroll, Resurrect Scroll, and Essential Enchanted Nectar.
  • JoinedDOCGroup - Redeem code to get Resurrect Scroll, 2000 Essence Tokens, and Cooking Mastery Flash. (You must join the Devas Of Creation Roblox group to redeem.)
  • FollowDevasDiscord - Redeem code to get Essential Swift Meat Omelette, 3500 Essence Tokens, Escape Scroll, and 100 Faction Tokens.

How to Codes for Redeem Devas of Creation

Fortunately, using codes in Devas of Creation is no more difficult than it is in other Roblox games. This feature is available from the very beginning of the game, as soon as you complete the tutorial. For convenience, you can follow these steps:

  • First, launch the Devas of Creation experience on Roblox .
  • Next, complete the short tutorial if you haven't done so already.
  • Once you start the story, click on the gear icon in the upper-left corner of the screen and select the Codes option.
  • Finally, enter the code in the corresponding box and click Redeem to claim your rewards.

How to Get More Devas of Creation Codes

Now that you know about some of the rewards that Devas of Creation codes can offer, you'll probably want to know how to get more of them. Similar to other Roblox games, to do this, players should follow the developers' official pages. There, you'll not only find codes, but also news about upcoming updates and events.

  • Devas of Creation X page
  • Devas of Creation Discord server
  • Devas of Creation Roblox group

item.title: Pokemon Rusty: EV Trainer
item.description: If you want to be the very best without putting in the work, you have to be the absolute worst.

item.title: Red Dead Redemption: 8 Best Reasons To Go For A Low Honor Run
item.description:
Key Takeaways

  • Embracing a low honor run immerses players in the true Wild West outlaw lifestyle, offering a different narrative perspective.
  • Players can still achieve the prestigious Man of Honor achievement in a low honor run.
  • Lower honor levels make the game more challenging by limiting resources, increasing bounty hunter encounters, and enabling crimes with fewer obstacles.

In the world of Red Dead Redemption , players explore the complexities of an intense narrative focused on John Marston's quest for redemption. Although Marston's main story revolves around his efforts to reconcile with the past and achieve a peaceful future, the game allows for different paths of honor, including the opportunity to follow a darker and more chaotic trajectory.

Opting for a low honor run offers an alternative and intriguing view of this relentless Wild West, where one lives as a true outlaw, exploring the consequences of questionable morality. Below are the main reasons to embark on a low honor run and see how far the dark side of John Marston can go in Red Dead Redemption .

8 A Lifestyle More Similar To The Wild West

No Room For Heroism

Making John Marston follow a low honor run in Red Dead Redemption serves as a commentary on the lifestyle people led in the Wild West, an era marked by violence. An honorable character trying to be the hero doesn't quite fit with the setting's harsh reality.

Moreover, adopting this path allows players to experience the true essence of outlaws in the Wild West, taking advantage of weak laws, ambushes, and characteristic confrontations of the time. This deep immersion in the criminal lifestyle enriches the narrative, making the experience more authentic and engaging.

7 There Is An Achievement For Low Honor

Completionists Need This Achievement

Although it's possible to obtain the Man of Honor/Chivalry’s Dead achievement in a high honor run, those who choose to explore the criminal side of John Marston in Red Dead Redemption can also unlock it during a low honor journey. To achieve it, Marston needs to reach the maximum fame level while keeping honor at the highest or lowest possible level.

This achievement is an incentive for those who prefer to sow chaos in the Wild West, offering justification to commit crimes without losing the chance to achieve this feat. The low honor run transforms the gaming experience, allowing the protagonist to live as a true outlaw, dominated by violence and the pursuit of power.

6 An Exclusive Horse For John Marston

Being Bad Has Its Benefits

When John Marston reaches the second level of low honor, the Road Agent, he can whistle to summon a new exclusive mount, the Dark Horse. This beautiful animal has a sleek black body, some white hair, and red eyes.

Along with its beauty, the horse is somewhat better than many options available in the game. Even though it's not as fast, it compensates with more stamina and health than other horses. The Dark Horse also doesn't lose speed when off-road, making it an excellent option for combat.

5 Unique Interactions With NPCs

Mostly Rude, Sometimes Funny

John Marston's personality also transforms when choosing a low honor path in the game, noticeable mainly through interactions with NPCs. For example, instead of greeting someone he meets, he will insult them.

This enhances immersion during the journey through Red Dead Redemption , as it's possible to notice a real difference in the character based on his honor level. Additionally, many of these insults are funny and can lead to some laughs, hearing the offenses from both John Marston and the various NPCs encountered throughout the game.

4 Better Prices At Thieves’ Landing

Profiting More There

Choosing a low honor path means that players will not have the same freedom to maximize profit by selling various loot to shops in towns along the way. However, this can be circumvented because Thieves’ Landing starts offering more money to John.

If players are unsure about the consequences John Marston might face by not getting good prices from merchants, as happens when the character is honorable, they have other options. Moreover, Thieves’ Landing has one of the best settings in the game, capturing the essence of the Wild West with many criminals and fugitives living there.

3 More Bounty Hunters Appear

For Those Seeking Action Moments

Throughout the story of Red Dead Redemption , players are susceptible to random encounters on the map. Groups of bounty hunters may come after John Marston's head, which happens even more frequently when the character doesn't have positive honor levels.

Those seeking good doses of action in Rockstar's open-world game can find it thanks to the random encounters provided by bounty hunters, which will be more intense and frequent. It's also an excellent opportunity to improve dueling skills during the shootouts that will happen due to John Marston's low honor.

2 More Freedom To Commit Crimes

People Fear John Marston

As John Marston's honor decreases in Red Dead Redemption , his reputation as a dangerous outlaw spreads, causing people to fear him. This natural intimidation makes it easier to commit crimes across the game's map. Citizens think twice before reporting him to the authorities, enhancing the game's immersion.

Additionally, the cost to bribe witnesses decreases significantly, making it easier to silence those who witness John's criminal acts. With fewer people willing to speak or interfere, it's possible to continue a path of crime with fewer obstacles, intensifying the experience of living as a true outlaw in the Wild West.

1 The Game Becomes More Difficult Overall

Some Resources Are Out Of Reach

For those who wish to add more difficulty to Red Dead Redemption , choosing a path without much honor can contribute to that factor. This is because the game, in general, becomes more complicated, placing new obstacles for the character to complete missions.

For example, not having access to discounts and higher selling prices in many of the map's shops makes it impossible to earn easy money in the game, which, although not very important, still has some utility. Additionally, the fact that the John is constantly pursued by bounty hunters is another significant problem that must be dealt with.

item.title: Stardew Valley: How to Maximize the Green Rain Event
item.description:
Quick Links

  • How To Maximize the Green Rain Event in Stardew Valley

Stardew Valley ’s Update 1.6 brought a ton of content to the game, including an all-new farm type and an environmental effect known as Green Rain. The Green Rain event is a strange phenomenon where translucent green rain falls from the sky, casting a magical glow over the Valley. With so much happening around the farm, it's easy to get overwhelmed by this mysterious weather effect in Stardew Valley . To help you maximize your Green Rain experience, this guide highlights the activities you should focus on.

How To Maximize the Green Rain Event in Stardew Valley

The Green Rain is a pretty rare and unpredictable event that occurs during the Summer season in Stardew Valley . As such, you should regularly check the Weather Report on TV to prepare for this event beforehand. Keep an eye out for any unusual weather reports, particularly those mentioning "anomalous readings." This is a sign that a Green Rain event is coming soon.

Here are a few things you can do to make the most of the special Green Rain event in Stardew Valley.

Gather Moss

One of the first things you can do during the Green Rain event is to gather Moss. The Green Rain supercharges the growth of all vegetation, including the moss that typically grows on trees. On the day of the Green Rain event, almost all trees in the Valley will be covered in Moss . You can harvest this Moss using your Scythe or Axe.

Moss is used in many crafting recipes, including Speed-Gro fertilizer, Mushroom Log , and baits for fishing. While it’s a great opportunity to gather Moss, you don't have to collect all the Moss on the day of the Green Rain itself and can focus on other resources you need.

Collect Fiddlehead Ferns

During the Green Rain, strange, vine-like trees will spawn around the Valley, especially on your Farm and in Cindersap Forest. When chopped with an Axe, these trees will drop Fiddlehead Ferns.

Fiddlehead Fern is a rare forageable items that you will need to complete the Chef's Bundle and Wild Medicine Bundle in the Community Center. They’re the only forageable items that are classified as vegetables and can be turned into Pickles or Juice, or used to prepare the Fiddlehead Risotto.

While Fiddlehead Ferns can be picked in the Secret Woods during Summer or in the Skull Cavern, the Green Rain is the perfect time for players to stock up on this valuable resource.

Harvest Green Rain Weeds

Another thing you’ll notice during the Green Rain is an increased number of Weeds around the Valley. These weeds can drop valuable resources like Mixed Seeds , Mixed Flower Seeds , and Fiber when cleared with your Scythe or Sword. Sometimes, a few larger Weeds will spawn that can drop Moss and Mossy Seeds .

The weeds that appear during the Green Rain event are temporary. They don't damage your crops or other plants and disappear naturally the next day . So, while you can harvest them for resources, you don't need to worry about them spreading.

Stockpile Mossy Seeds, Wood, And Fibre

If you really like the Green Rain Trees that spawn during this event, you can plant them using Mossy Seed . You can obtain these seeds by shaking or chopping down the Green Rain Trees . Once you have a Mossy Seed, you can plant it on your farm and wait for it to grow into one of the special Green Rain Tree variations.

You can also get plenty of Wood , a basic building material, by chopping down trees. Moreover, the increased growth of weeds during the Green Rain event provides an opportunity to gather large quantities of Fiber , another essential crafting material. Stockpiling these resources during the Green Rain event can help you be well-prepared for future projects.

Talk To Villagers

Interacting with villagers in Stardew Valley during the Green Rain event is a fun way to connect with them and hear special dialogue that you wouldn’t have otherwise. In the Year 1 Green Rain event, most of the villagers stay indoors for protection from the weird weather conditions, except Linus and Demetrius .

Linus, the old man, doesn’t mind the Green Rain and stays outside his tent. Similarly, Demetrius, the town’s scientist, roams around the Valley in a yellow hazmat suit, studying the Green Rain. Make sure to talk to them and hear their unique perspectives on the Green Rain.
